title: Capital One to Pay $5.15 Billion for Fintech Brex
description: Capital One agreed to acquire corporate expense management company Brex for $5.15 billion. Brex CEO Pedro Franceschi joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech." (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Capital One agreed to acquire corporate expense management company Brex for $5.15 billion. Brex CEO Pedro Franceschi joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech." (Source: Bloomberg)
